bug.question: I make honey. I fly around flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am small and buzzy.
🌸 I like sweet things from flowers.
🍯 I live in a hive.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry food. I am very small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am strong for my size.
🏠 I live in a colony.
🌿 I like crumbs and leaves.

bug.question: I jump and am green. I make a sound on summer days. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to eat plants.
🎶 I chirp when it's sunny.
🦗 I have strong legs for jumping.

bug.question: I have pretty wings with colors. I fly around in the sunshine. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 I used to be a caterpillar.
🌷 I like to sip nectar from flowers.
🌈 My wings are very colorful.

bug.question: I make a sticky web. I catch bugs for food. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I have eight legs.
🕷️ I can be scary, but I'm also helpful.
🪰 I trap other insects.

bug.question: I light up at night. I twinkle in the dark. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I am not a star.
🔦 I carry my own light.
✨ You can catch me in a jar.

bug.question: I am a beetle with a rounded shape. I am often black and red with spots. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am considered lucky.
⚫ My spots are round and dark.
🌱 Gardeners are happy to see me.

bug.question: I live in a group, and build big hills with mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I build homes underground.
🐜 I am a very social bug.
🌱 I help aerate the soil.

bug.question: I sing loudly in the summertime, but only some of us sing. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I live in trees.
📢 Only the male insects sing.
🎶 We are known for our loud buzzing.

bug.question: I'm a hard shelled insect that rolls dung into a ball. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ I make a ball of poop.
🌍 My species helps with soil health
💩 I am a kind of beetle.

ocean.question: I am big and blue. Fish swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I'm made of lots and lots of water!
🚢 Boats like to float on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl on the sand. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
🏖️ You can find me at the beach.
🏠 My shell is my home.

ocean.question: I am yellow and live in the sea. I have many points. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I look like a star in the sky.
🖐️ I have arms, but I don't hug.
🌊 I live under the water.

ocean.question: I jump and play in the ocean. I make a clicking sound. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐬 I am a very smart animal.
💦 I like to swim in groups.
🗣️ I use sounds to talk to my friends.

ocean.question: I am a big, big fish with sharp teeth. Be careful!

hints.text: 🦈 Some people are afraid of me!
🌊 I am a predator of the ocean.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth!

ocean.question: I am a very tiny and colorful fish who lives in an anemone.

hints.text: 🤡 I share my name with someone who is very silly.
🧡 I am bright orange and white.
🏡 The anemone is my home.

ocean.question: I am very big and sing songs in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am the biggest animal on Earth!
🐳 I breathe air, but I live in the water.
🎶 I make a loud and deep sound.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the sea. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
🐾 I have many arms to help me grab things.
💙 I squirt ink when I'm scared.

ocean.question: I float in the water, wobble and sting. What am I?

hints.text: 🪼 I'm clear and squishy.
🌊 I drift in the ocean currents.
🤕 Be careful, I can give you a little zap!

ocean.question: I have a hard shell and swim very slowly in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I like to eat seaweed.
🏖️ I lay my eggs on the beach.
🟢 I live a very long time.
